oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1947-07-19 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from July 19, 1947. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Terry O'Sullivan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Opening statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- Ridin' Ropin' (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Foy Willing talks -- Peg O' My Heart (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Weber's Bread commercial -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Blue Tail Fly (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Foy Willing talks -- Too Late (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the radio play -- Radio play 'The Fires At Sherman Point' [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KNX (Radio station : Los Angeles, Calif.); All star western theatre (Radio program); Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; O'Sullivan, Terry, 1915-2006; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Harrell, Scotty; Hargus, Tom (Director); Wilson, Ray (Writer)
